data.text: @AnaCoronad2 Hola Ana, te hemos enviado nuevamente respuesta en nuestra conversación por mensaje directo. Un saludo.
@indabajo Hola Laurie, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@kayjay_potato We're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. As soon as the baggage center has any news about your bag's location, you'll be contacted via SMS or email. Please accept our apologies. We also ask you to please wait for the arrival of the payment issued on september 29. Kind regards
@AnaCoronad2 Ana, te hemos solicitado más información sobre tu caso para poder revisar. Quedamos pendientes por ese medio, saludos.
@organic773 Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, email address and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@emmaclairehdgsn Thank you.
@AnaCoronad2 Hola, Ana Belén. Disculpa, desconocemos los detalles de tu caso, ¿nos envías un mensaje privado para ver cómo ayudarte? Gracias. Un saludo
@smilearora09 Hola, we have received your messages in private, please do not make flooding, as your messages could be deleted and your profile banned. Thank you.
@smilearora09 Hola, our colleagues are investigating why the payment is not with you yet, we appreciate your patience. Regards.
@claucastillo_10 Hola Claudia, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@DebbieG38931588 Thank you.
@DebbieG38931588 Hola Debbie, in order to check this, please send us your IbPlus number, your complete name and your boarding passes by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Martu_ski Hola Marti entendemos se ha presentado alguna incidencia con tu vuelo, ¿estás en aeropuerto en estos momentos? Saludos
@Ryan_Appleton Hola Ryan, we have responded to your direct messages requesting more information about your case. We are waiting for that means, regards.
@r_gamba We are sorry for the inconvenience, Ricardo. Please send us the indicated information (PIR number and full name) in order to check it in the system. Regards.
@r_gamba Hola Ricardo, did you get a PIR number (Property Irregularity Report) at the airport? If so, could you provide us the details and your full name by DM, please? Regards.
@goforgin2 Hola, our colleagues will proceed to review your case and they will give you an answer as soon as possible. Best regards.

data.text: @goforgin2 Hola, sorry to read this. Please clear all cookies from your browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG
@Yet_B_ Hola, we're sorry to read this. Could you please send us a DM with more details about what happened? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@CarolynHenne Hola Carolyn, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with more details about your query https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@ladyniasan Hola, did you add your IBPlus number to your booking? Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

urls.title: Iberia's platform to recover your lost belongings
urls.description: Everything lost can be found. Foundspot is a free service connecting people who have lost items or pets with the people who have found it.

data.text: @jackwa1sh Hola Jack, sorry for the inconvenience. We've replied the tweet explaining how to register the missing object in our lost and found tool (foundspot). If the bag was left onboard, please access https://t.co/McKyXP7Yxx . We remain at your disposal

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

urls.title: Iberia's platform to recover your lost belongings
urls.description: Everything lost can be found. Foundspot is a free service connecting people who have lost items or pets with the people who have found it.

data.text: @ShamrockTenors Hola, we're sorry to read this. If the hand luggage was left onboard, please register it as a missing object on the foundspot tool https://t.co/McKyXP7Yxx . You'll be contacted by email if there's a match. Best regards
@theglobedancer Hola, could you give us your email, complete name and boarding passes by DM to help from here? Thank you.
@KalenManshack Hola Kalen, could you send us the details by DM please? Thank you.
@ELarkin25 Hola Elena, could you send us the details that we asked by DM? Thank you.
@JeanCarloMachad Hola Jean, you could be able to do it 24 hours before the flight at: https://t.co/0Kf2bPGDPV. Regards.
They receive the best training so you can fly with complete safety ✈️ (4/4)
The centre provides training for our own maintenance technicians and those of other airlines. In 2021 alone, we delivered 100,000 hours of training to… 🤔 (3/4)
The centre has eight classrooms and a simulator room where the mechanics carry out…❓(2/4)
Did you know that our mechanics also receive training in simulators? 🖥 Here's some more information about our Maintenance Training Centre (1/4) https://t.co/vjl3DEMk9F

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to offline and online games such as gaming consoles, tabletop games, video game publishers

data.text: @MoorgateMermaid We remain at your disposal.
@MoorgateMermaid Please let us know if we can help you from here. Regards.
@MoorgateMermaid Hola Simoney, how we can help you?
@AnabelleKP Hola, Anabelle. Sentimos leer tu comentario. Si podemos ayudarte por aquí en algo o revisar lo sucedido, quedamos a tu disposición. Un saludo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@Amirajad2 Hola Amira, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information and in case you opened a formal complaint could you also please share us the claim case number? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@dtmd33 Hola, please send us a direct message with more details about what happened so we can follow up from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@RealNathanPink Hola, thank you for choosing us. We have sent a response to your query by direct message. Kind regards. 😊
@johnsads Hola John, we have sent you more information in our DM conversation. Regards.
@that_srinidhi Hello. We are very sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. We hope to improve the impression you get on this occasion in the future. Kind regards.
@dguillaume Thank you very much. We have sent you a new DM. Regards.
@dguillaume Hello. Thanks for writing to us. please send us a MD with all the details of the reservation you want to make. Kind regards.

@harelpls Hola Harley, we have not seen any reported incidents. We would like you to tell us what is the error you have seen when trying to acquire your booking. We look forward to your response, regards.

@aarobc At the time of making the payment you will be able to see which are the payment methods available for your country. If the error persists, please send us a screenshot by direct message https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we can review it from this department, regards. 2/2

urls.title: Plan your journey and book your ticket anywhere, anytime at Iberia website - Iberia

data.text: @aarobc Hola Aaron, we suggest you carry out the search process for your flights through our official website https://t.co/TcJeGFzOX2 1/2

urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text:
@Esnayra If there is anything else we can help you with, please send us a direct message https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 with all the details. Regards
https://t.co/va7wYIeka5 2/2
@Esnayra Hola Carlos, we feel the inconvenience caused. If you want to make a claim about what you tell us, you can do it through our web form. 1/2
@bark_mates We have responded to your private messages requesting more information, regards.
@jdperroni Hello. Sorry for the delay in our response. We have requested new information via DM. Kind regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @i_twert The area in charge will contact you as soon as they review your case. Regards.  https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG /2

@i_twert We are very sorry for what you tell us. From here we could not indicate different information. If you consider it necessary, you can file a claim through our website once your flight ends. /1

@i_twert Hello. The area in charge mentions that they have already contacted you. As we see, you will complete the selection of seats through the web. If you have any additional questions, please let us know. Kind regards.
@Kongatonhifi Hello. We do not know the details of your case. please send us an MD with all the information. Kind regards.
@bark_mates Hello. We are very sorry for what you tell us. Please send us an MD with all the details of your case. Kind regards.
@JohnHes46426223 We reiterate our apologies, we suggest reporting this situation with our colleagues on board. Kind regards.
@JohnHes46426223 Hello, John. We are very sorry for any inconvenience that may have arisen. We hope to improve the impression that you get on this occasion in the future. Kind regards.
@PeledYael Hello. We are very sorry for what you tell us. We have indicated the procedure through an DM. Kind regards.
@MariaHutley Hello; Gladys. We are very sorry for the incident with your luggage. Please send us an DM with your claim file, PIR reference code and the associated email. Kind regards.

@MonicaBarry545 Hola Monica, we do not know the details of your case. We would like to know if you have opened a claim at the airport for this inconvenience, let us know the data by MD to know how to assist you in a better way, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@cryptoapenc Hola, we are sorry that you have this impression, as we have indicated above the safety restrictions per flight will depend on the regulations established by the country of origin or destination. We remain at your disposal for any new query or doubt, regards.

@divanni_ Hola, we ask you for the same respect with which we have had this conversation on our side. We have requested information about your inquiries by MD. We are attentive to your answer, regards.

@divanni_ Hola, we are sorry you have this impression of us. We do not know the reason for your comments, if you have any pending queries with us we would like you to indicate it in detail by DM, we wait for your response. Regards

@brahmMann1 Hola Mabi, we would like you to indicate the details of your reservation by MD to review, please tell us your name as it appears on the ticket and how it should appear correctly, we wait for your response. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@bumblesmcgee Hola Melissa, we're sorry you had a bad experience on your flight. We appreciate your comments to be able to continue improving our service and thus provide you with a better experience on your next trip, we remain at your disposal for any new query. Regards

@samcoleman_mfc Hola Sam, we would like you to indicate the data of your booking by MD to review carefully: Your full name and reservation code. We look forward to your messages to assist you, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@kayjay_potato Hola, we understand that as we have indicated above if our luggage companions have news about the corresponding search they should be able to inform you by SMS or email. We remain attentive to your case and pending the follow-up of your refund, regards.
@bumblesmcgee Hola Melissa. We're sorry to read this. Could you indicate us more details on what happened during your flight?
@jaquezbilingual Hola Jessica, in order to verify your case, please send us your PIR number and full name by direct message. kind regards.

@SebaBlink Hola Sebastian, we have previously asked you by direct message to send us the details of your booking and we didn't get an answer. Please send us more details about your case by DM. Kind regards.
Today our flight arriving from Madrid inaugurated the new taxiway TWY L1 at @PragueAirport 🛬 https://t.co/z5VsJ9HeMq

@gtrejo74 Hola Guillermo, sentimos leer tus comentarios. ¿Nos confirmas si tras el incidente iniciaste una reclamación en el aeropuerto?, ¿tienes un código PIR asociado?. Por favor envíanos todos los detalles por MD para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@LeslieKritzer Hola Leslie, we have answered your DM. Our colleagues are working on your case, we will inform you as soon as we have any updates. Kind regards.

urls.title: Travel restrictions due to COVID-19
urls.description: Check the regulations, requirements and restrictions for travel established by the different countries. Plan your flight ensuring that you meet all the requirements to make your international trip.

data.text: @ethramon Hola, the restrictions are not established by the airlines, they are dictated by the local authorities of each country. While travelling from/to Spain, the usage of a face mask is still mandatory, for more details you can visit our website https://t.co/tAXgHHvb0O . Regards.

data.text: @goforgin2 Hola, we recommend you to delete this image as it has personal information. Please give us more details and send us your case information by private message. Regards.

@jwalltin Hola Joachim. We are sorry to read this, we understand that you are at the airport in this momento so we suggest you to approach with our colleagues so they can assist you directly. Kind regards.
@sartorialsab Hola Sabrina, could you please send us your booking code and full name by DM? Kind regards.
@PPV128 Hola Pablo, we've just replied your DM. Regards

@RepkoKarina Hola Karina, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM , we'll continue through that channel. Kind regards

urls.title: Check-in online - Iberia
urls.description: Reserva tu asiento, obtén tu tarjeta de embarque online y podrás ir directamente a la puerta de embarque.

data.text: @JoJan98988560 Hola Jan, thank you for contacting us, if the App doesn't allow you to download your boarding pass, please, try it through the browser at the following link: https://t.co/zLqj7mnP0E, also please, share us by DM your booking information to help you. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@qchokie5 Hola Becca, we are sorry to read this, in principle, once you arrive in Madrid, in case you have any inconvenience, please contact our desk agents at the airport in order they be able to help you, Kind regards
@stratfordjones Hola , thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM with all details about your baggage claim. Regards

@jake_savin Hola Jake, yes, wee have a broad selection of special menus, however, special meals must be requested with at least 24 hours of anticipation. Please send us a DM with the details of your booking so we can assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
